content.question: Which of the following most directly made the election of the African American legislators depicted in the image possible?

choices.label: The passage of the Fourteenth Amendment
The passage of the Fifteenth Amendment
The passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964
The passage of the Voting Rights Act of 1965

content.answer: The passage of the Fifteenth Amendment
